content: 10 aug 16 **great news ** the amazing nadia of yarnutopia has made a **video tutorial** 1 for this square d scroll down to august 2016 on her 365 days of granny squares 2 page and click on number 222 to be taken to the video on youtube please feel free to contact me if you have any problems with this pattern round 2 is a bit of a bear i m just saying - 29 may 11 i have added a schematic of rounds 1 and 2 to the pattern and my project page 3 photo 3 i hope it helps with the stitch and colour-change sequence **please note ** the completed blanket in the photo is by ohsobroke /people/ohsobroke 1 https //m youtube com/watch v=ve-xcqne8ji&feature=youtu be 2 https //m youtube com/watch v=ve-xcqne8ji&feature=youtu be 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/judyk/peace-sign-granny-square
